name: Horror Souls
description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators. Also if you encounter bugs or any problems, tell us in the Forum and we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.
The Soul of the Forest is an ancient artifact which keeps the balance between good and evil.
Only this artifact has the ability to ban evil creatures from our world.
It is your fathers and your task to protect the Soul of the Forest from harm...
A task which you do flawlessly until one day your father does not return from one of his patrols.
As you start looking for him in the forest you cross paths with a masked man who appears to have purloined the Soul of the Forest.
The masked man disappears into the darkness of the night.
You have to catch him but our task isn't quite that easy.
As the Soul of the Forest is not any longer where it belongs the creatures of the darkness are slowly crawling out of their caves and are taking over the land.
The era of darkness has come!
🔸Make your way through 6 huge areas while trying to catch the masked man
🔸Escape the creatures of the darkness or get eaten alive
🔸Find out what happened to your father
🔸Survive while the deadly era of darkness reveals its bloodstained claws
🔸Your way is enlightened by countless souls which share their past with you
🔸Discover the remains of a lost age
🔸Find many letters and notes which give you deep impressions of the background store and the lore
🔸Rescue our world by retriving the Soul of the Forest
